pageContent.title: Focus on Priorities
pageContent.descriptionText: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:16pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px; padding:0 0 0 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Focus on Priorities</Introtext><welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">“The best way to identify Dr. Cardonza’s need is to confirm the cardiology department’s priorities and question how his concern links to those priorities. This will help keep things in context and the conversation focused.”</welcomeText>
